page.title: 05DAILY LIFE, HASELOR, WARKS
page.content: I usually get up by myself then I get my trousers and socks on. I go downstairs to have my breakfast. I have weetabix and sometimes I have marmalade sandwiches. I go upstairs to brush my teeth. By then it is quarter past eight. I put my shirt and tie on then put on my tank jumper. I say goodbye to Mum then I walk to school or sometimes I go on my bike. After school I walk home. When I've got home I watch the telly and I play with my friends, we play football. It is lucky for me because I have some friends who live quite close. Sometimes they come to my house and sometimes I go to theirs.I have tea with my Mum and my sister.Then I go to bed, by then it is eight o'clock. I get to sleep very quickly. Oliver Williams a boy aged ten.
